name: Send data from Google Sheets to an HTTP endpoint using basic authentication
description: Streamline your data management process by automatically sending updates from Google Sheets to your desired endpoint. With this template, every time a new row is added or an existing row is modified in Google Sheets, Make will send the relevant data to your specified HTTP endpoint using basic authentication. This integration ensures that your data is always up-to-date and accessible, enhancing your workflow efficiency and reducing manual data entry errors.
